category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEShowUnconfiguredAssignedOccurrencesDefaultState
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default state of the Show Unconfigured Assigned Occurrences button or menu command when an application is opened or a new BOM window is created. The Show Unconfigured Assigned Occurrences button is available in the Manufacturing Process Planner and Part Planner applications. The menu command is available in Multi-Structure Manager. Valid Values: true - The Show Unconfigured Assigned Occurrences button is on when the application is opened. false - The Show Unconfigured Assigned Occurrences button is off when the application is opened.
